text:
Yes, 
I think everyone understands the two available options (MSA or no MSA). 
The difference using an MSA provides additional troubleshooting if a major
hardware change is done(ie.g. like a mobo replacement) and an easier path to
activation. 
…w
%40BYAPR05MB6552.namprd05.prod.outlook.com
